review: Great idea and started out working awesome. Tanked after 6 months. It does NOT play well with Apple products. I have two Iphones and an Ipad, all of them worked great at first. What you stream is limited(Netrflix, HBOGo, Pandora, YouTube) but not bad for the price. I really loved streaming pandora, but after a few months I was having trouble connecting to it. One of my apple products would see while the others wouldn't. Never consistent in which one it would be, but at least one of them worked. Then finally it stopped working at all, wouldn't stream, iphone said it was streaming but chromecast would never get going. Then finally it tanked and nothing could see it anymore. Also have one at work that no one can get connected to, andriod or ios. Was a great idea that they didn't test long enough.
